Subroutine simplex

755 : 
756 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
757 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
758 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
759 : 
760 :       subroutine simplex (invar, objfun)
761 :       use sce_mod
762 :       implicit none
763 : 
764 : !     * Declarations
765 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(npar,qopt), INTENT(inout) :: invar
766 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(qopt),      INTENT(inout) :: objfun
767 : 
768 : !     * Definitions
769 :       INTEGER :: i_, j_
770 :       REAL*8  :: newobjfun, minj, rangej
771 : 
772 : !     * REFLECTION STEP
773 : 
774 :       evolution = 'reflection'
775 :       newpoint(:) = invar(:,qopt)
776 :       centroid(optid(:)) = 1.d0 / (qopt - 1) * sum(invar(optid(:), 1:qopt - 1), 2)
777 :       newpoint(optid(:)) = 2.d0 * centroid(optid(:)) - invar(optid(:),qopt)
778 :       if (minval(newpoint(:) - parmin(:)) .lt. 0.d0 .or.                     &
779 :      &    maxval(newpoint(:) - parmax(:)) .gt. 0.d0) then
780 : 
781 : !       * MUTATION STEP
782 : !       * NB: MUTATION IS BASED ON THE SMALLEST HYPERCUBE OF THE SUBCOMPLEX,
783 : !       * NOT THE SMALLEST HYPERCUBE OF THE COMPLEX AS SUGGESTED BY DUAN ET AL.
784 : 
785 :         do i_ = 1, nopt
786 :           call random_number(ranscal)             ! SCALAR RANDOM NUMBER
787 :           j_ = optid(i_)
788 :           minj = parmin(j_)
789 :           rangej = parmax(j_) - minj
790 :           newpoint(j_) = minj + rangej * ranscal   ! UNIFORMLY DISTRIBUTED SAMPLE
791 :         enddo
792 :         evolution = 'mutation'
793 : 
794 : !       * CALCULATE OBJECTIVE FUNCTION
795 : 
796 :       endif
797 :       call runmodel(newpoint(:), newobjfun)
798 :       if (newobjfun .gt. objfun(qopt)) then
799 :         do j_ = 1, qopt
800 :           if (newobjfun .gt. objfun(j_)) then     ! SORT objfun HERE
801 :             objfun(j_+1:qopt) = objfun(j_:qopt-1) ! IN CASE alpha > 1
802 :             invar(:,j_+1:qopt) = invar(:,j_:qopt-1)
803 :             objfun(j_) = newobjfun
804 :             invar(:,j_) = newpoint(:)
805 :             exit
806 :           endif
807 :         enddo
808 :       else
809 : 
810 : !       * CONTRACTION STEP
811 : 
812 :         newpoint(optid(:)) = (centroid(optid(:)) + invar(optid(:),qopt)) * 0.5d0
813 :         evolution = 'contraction'
814 :         call runmodel(newpoint(:), newobjfun)
815 :         if (newobjfun .gt. objfun(qopt)) then
816 :           do j_ = 1, qopt
817 :             if (newobjfun .gt. objfun(j_)) then
818 :               objfun(j_+1:qopt) = objfun(j_:qopt-1)
819 :               invar(:,j_+1:qopt) = invar(:,j_:qopt-1)
820 :               objfun(j_) = newobjfun
821 :               invar(:,j_) = newpoint(:)
822 :               exit
823 :             endif
824 :           enddo
825 :         else
826 : 
827 : !         * ANOTHER MUTATION STEP
828 : 
829 :           do i_ = 1, nopt
830 :             call random_number(ranarr(:))         ! RANDOM ARRAY OF SIZE 1:nopt
831 :             j_ = optid(i_)
832 :             minj = minval(invar(j_,:))
833 :             rangej = maxval(invar(j_,:)) - minj
834 :             newpoint(j_) = minj + rangej * ranarr(i_)  ! UNIFORMLY DISTRIBUTED SAMPLE
835 :           enddo
836 :           evolution = 'mutation'
837 :           call runmodel(newpoint(:), newobjfun)
838 :           if (newobjfun .gt. objfun(qopt-1)) then
839 :             do j_ = 1, qopt - 1
840 :               if (newobjfun .gt. objfun(j_)) then
841 :                 objfun(j_+1:qopt) = objfun(j_:qopt-1)
842 :                 invar(:,j_+1:qopt) = invar(:,j_:qopt-1)
843 :                 objfun(j_) = newobjfun
844 :                 invar(:,j_) = newpoint(:)
845 :                 exit
846 :               endif
847 :             enddo
848 :           elseif (newobjfun .gt. 0.d0) then       ! REPLACE ANYWAY
849 :             objfun(qopt) = newobjfun
850 :             invar(:,qopt) = newpoint(:)
851 :           endif
852 :         endif
853 :       endif
854 : 
855 : !     * UPDATE 'currentbest' IF APPROPRIATE
856 : 
857 :       if (newobjfun .gt. bestobj) then
858 :         bestobj = newobjfun
859 :         bestincomp = newobjfun
860 :         open(kfile_currentbest,file=sfile_currentbest(1:len_trim(sfile_currentbest)))
861 :         write(kfile_currentbest,outformat) invar(:,1), bestobj
862 :         close(kfile_currentbest)
863 :         nsincebest = 0
864 :       elseif (newobjfun .gt. bestincomp) then
865 :         bestincomp = newobjfun
866 :       endif
867 : 
868 :       return
869 :       end subroutine simplex
